# AUDIO::PLAY_PAIN

## Summary
Plays a pain sound from the ped

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped: Index		- index of the actor to speak
* **AUD_DAMAGE_REASON** damageReason: Reason for the Pain
* **FLOAT** rawDamage = 0: Damage value (usually won't be needed)
* **BOOL** syncOverNetwork = false: Indicates whether this should automatically play on a locally controlled ped on remote machines

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Needs another parameter [int p2]. The signature is PED::PLAY_PAIN(Ped ped, int painID, int p1, int p2);

Last 2 parameters always seem to be 0.

EX: Function.Call(Hash.PLAY_PAIN, TestPed, 6, 0, 0);

Known Pain IDs
________________________

1 - Doesn't seem to do anything. Does NOT crash the game like previously said. (Latest patch)
6 - Scream (Short)
7 - Scared Scream (Kinda Long)
8 - On Fire
